content.question: In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, which of the following are the coordinates of the four vertices of the ellipse defined by <math alttext="fraction numerator x squared plus 2 x plus 1 over denominator 16 end fraction plus fraction numerator y squared minus 6 x plus 9 over denominator 25 end fraction equals 1"><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mn>16</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><mn>25</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses negative 6 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses 4 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma 7 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, and <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma negative 1 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma 8 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, and <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses negative 3 comma negative 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses 5 comma negative 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, and <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma negative 8 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses negative 3 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses 5 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 8 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, and <math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma 8 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>, and <math alttext="open parentheses negative 1 comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
